website_summaries.verdict: A premium trumpet that delivers great sound and is easy to play.
pros: Expert craftsmanship to ensure the trumpet produces a consistent, vibrant tone
Adjustable third valve trigger enables a musician to enjoy a comfortable grip on the trumpet
Two-piece brass bell allows for optimal playability
cons: Some customers experienced issues with the valves

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Grandson had been renting a used trumpet from a music store. Since this is the beginning of his 3rd year playing, it was decided to buy him his own. The sound quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: W. Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet was in perfect condition. It was delivered ahead of schedule and packed very well. It was bought to replace the one my daughter had been playing for the past 3+ years. As a Yamaha player myself, I knew that this instrument was a good choice. To put an end to the debate of where this trumpet was made/coming from, the trumpet was made in China, it was stamped on the second valve casing and it was shipped from Japan. Yamaha is a Japanese company. They must have their instruments made from other countries.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It ships from Japan
customer_reviews.text: We did not know it was coming from Japan so that was a complete disappointment to wait so long. DVD was in Japanese, but the trumpet is beautiful and plays very nice. My 11 year old son was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Michelene Decrow

customer_reviews.title: Best value, and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We love this trumpet! Great quality, and by far the best value for the price. It comes with a solid case. Excellent sound quality. And, the customer service was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Prince

customer_reviews.title: Rusty and Moldy
customer_reviews.text: The item description said used but good quality, but the item itself was in very poor quality. The box was beat up, and the trumpet was rusty. It seemed like there was mold in the case, as well. Returning immediately. Beware of accuracy of used product description!
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for band student
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a middle school band student. My son loves it. Cheaper than rental if he uses it for 3 years. The valves work better since new and good sound
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Highly priced
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and it is very well made, but I think the price was a little high. I brought it because I needed it in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: MsLiz

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, nice case and accesories
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it and it does sound better than her intro level trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: SeaHaucks

customer_reviews.title: Great student trumpet at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great student trumpet priced very reasonably! Sound quality is excellent and ours comes with a great case. Shipping from Japan was faster than we expected and we received it only few days over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful trumpet. I bought it for my grandaughter and she loves it also. Stuart Scheer
customer_reviews.author: stuart scheer

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gift. Great sound and look. Helpful collaboration with a seller
customer_reviews.author: aliyadze

customer_reviews.title: For my Grandson....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson - he had one years ago - leased in high school, but told me he had to quit band and give it back. He was so surprised and delighted to have a trumpet again. His own. (The things Grandmas do!). ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Very good horn
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet is clearly a step up from super inexpensive trumpets and is certainly good enough for beginner to intermediate players. I’ve owned a Bach Strad in the past and a cheap $99 horn. This Yamaha is closer to the Strad than the cheap one. Valves are nice, slides work perfectly, fit and finish is perfect, the sound is very good, and intonation is excellent. If you’re looking for a very good horn at a fair price then consider this model.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Two words: over priced. Almost $700? The quality is a joke for what you pay for; go find a better, cheaper trumpet somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

product_meta.title: Yamaha YTR-2330 Standard Bb Trumpet Bb Trumpet
product_meta.description: Color:YTR-2330 - Base ModelYTR-2330 Standard Bb Trumpet Bb Trumpet. The Yamaha YTR-2330 is the latest version of Yamaha's main student trumpet, an instrument that has assisted in the development of thousands of trumpeters all over the world. Two-piece bell of the YTR-2330 is crafted using state-of-the-art production methods, delivering a consistent, vibrant tone. The balanced weight and addition of an adjustable third valve trigger allows for a natural hand position and promotes proper playing technique, while the water key on the third valve slide adds to the ease of use and over-all playability of the instrument. The newly redesigned, durable yet light two-piece bell is made of yellow brass for optimal playability and to promote good technique and endurance. Highly durable monel alloy pistons as well as newly designed piston buttons and bottom caps help lengthen the life of the instrument while also maximizing sound quality. The 2nd and main tuning slides are produced using the same method as high-end Yamaha models, which provides stability, a more refined tonal color and added durability.
feature_bullets: New pistons, piston caps and buttons

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
